application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: 1-5 Cromwell Place, 35-36 Thurloe Place, 3,4, 20 Thurloe place mews, SW7 2HL
description: Details of Condition 3 (Code of construction practice) of planning permission PP/23/08494 (Creation of public entrance and courtyard on Thurloe Place. Creation of ancillary restaurant/bar and associated kitchen extension and plant at ground floor of 4 and 5 Cromwell Place. New wayfinding strategy. Installation of traditional retractable canopies. Internal and external alterations with external lighting. Listed buildng consent is sought for: Creation of public entrance and wall on Thurloe Place. Erection of link lobby and glazed extension to rear of No. 1 Cromwell Place. Installation of sash window to No.1 Cromwell Place. Introduction of single door opening from Nos. 35-36 Thurloe Place into the courtyard. Creation of ancillary restaurant/bar at the ground floor of Nos. 4 and 5 Cromwell Place including the erection of a glazed extension to the rear and widening of the single entrance door. Creation of two openings to the dividing wall between Nos. 4 and 5 Cromwell Place. Installation of dumbwaiter and kitchen extract. Removal of non-original partition wall between the front and rear rooms of No. 5 Cromwell Place. Removal of partition wall to the lower ground floor of No. 4 Cromwell Place and the erection of partition walls to the front and rear rooms at lower ground floor of No.5 Cromwell Place. Creation of lobby areas in the entrance halls of Nos. 1, 2 and 3 Cromwell Place. New wayfinding strategy. Addition of traditional external retractable canopies, new external lighting,signage and associated works)
